title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
description: When using the JarExporter tool, it is causing issues with the synchronization of files. The exported jar file seems to include itself, leading to inconsistencies in the synchronization process.
OB: Currently, when using the JarExporter tool, the exported jar file includes itself, causing out-of-sync issues.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to ensure proper synchronization.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Use the JarExporter tool to export a jar file.
2. Observe that the exported jar file includes itself.
3. As a result, observe the out-of-sync issues that occur due to the inclusion of the jar file within itself.
